resources.string: We couldn\'t find any open restaurants matching your parameters. Please try again later.
We failed to find any restaurant suggestions for you. Please try again later.
Like Food Button? Then please take a few seconds to rate it in the Play Store. Every rating goes a long way towards motivating me to continue improving it. Thank you!
Your current location has been set.
Your current location is where the Food Button searches for restaurants.
We couldn\'t get your current location. Please try again or reset location services.
Your current location is \"Automatic\", which means that you need to enable location services and then wait a couple seconds before hitting the Food Button. Would you like to do that now?
